<style>
/* todoList */
body.large {
	font-size: 125%;
}
.todoAddTable, .todoAddTableTd, .todoAddTextBox{
	width:100%;
}

.todoListTable {
	width: 100%;
/*	table-layout: fixed;*/
	background-color: #ffffff;
	font-size: 85%;
}

.todoItemOdd {
	cursor: move;
	font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
	background-color: #dbdcde;
}

.todoItemEven {
	cursor: move;
	font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
	background-color: #ffffff;
}

.todoItemOddMark {
	cursor: move;
	font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
	
	background-color: #ccddd5;
}

.todoItemEvenMark {
	cursor: move;
	font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
	
	background-color: #ccddd5;
}

.todoFloatItem {
	position:absolute;
	z-index:900;
	filter:alpha(opacity=70);
	-moz-opacity:0.7;
	opacity:0.7;
}

.todoPriorityTd {
	width: 1.5em;
}
.todoPriority {
	text-align: center;
	cursor: pointer;
	color: #4c4c4c;
	font-size: 90%;
}

.todoTextTd {
	width: 100%;
	overflow: hidden;
}
.todoTextDiv {
	cursor: move;
	overflow: hidden;
	width: 100%;
	word-break: break-all;
}
.todoText {
	text-align: left;
	cursor: default;
}
.todoTextEdit {
	width: 100%;
}

.todoCheckTd {
	text-align: center;
/*	width: 1.2em;*/
	width: 20px;
}
.todoCheck {
	cursor: pointer;
}

.todoDeleteTd {
/*	width: 1.2em;*/
	width: 20px;
}
.todoDelete {
	float: center;
	cursor: pointer;
	margin-top:2px;
	margin-bottom:1px;
}
</style>
<script type="text/javascript">
is_gadgetBaseUrl = "__IS_GADGET_BASE_URL__";
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">is_loadScript("__IS_GADGET_BASE_URL__/todoList.js")</script>
